Reviews.Title: nice television for the price
Reviews.Author: Jackie C
Reviews.Content: The television was a refurbished one, and for the price, quality of pictures, sound, i am enjoying it at this very moment. I'm glad that I made a good choice thus far without having any problems with the television.  Thanks

Reviews.Title: Service and product quality very good.
Reviews.Author: Sonja Trokey
Reviews.Content: Delivery was very prompt.  The picture of this TV was great! Very clear images so don't need to change my eye glass prescription after all.
